titleHead: Evidence to support your appeal - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Evidence to support your appeal
descriptionPara1: Evidence is any information that supports your appeal such as a letter, written statement or medical report. Useful evidence shows how your condition affects your life.
descriptionPara2: You can upload evidence now or after you have submitted your appeal. You can also post it in. You’ll be sent the address after you’ve submitted your appeal.
